page.title: 10PARTRIDGE GREEN SCHOOL
page.content: JOLESFIELD PRIMARY SCHOOL has 154 children from four and a half to eleven years of age arranged in 6 classes of approx.27 children,3INFANT and 3 JUNIOR.There are 6 teachers,the headmaster,the secretary,the welfare lady,the cleaning lady and the caretaker.SCHOOL DINNERS are cooked on the premises but most children eat their own packed lunches.Morning session is from 8.50 - 11.55am.and afternoon session from 1.00-3.20pm.The school has it's own solar-heated SWIMMING POOL donated by parents and used by all classes in the SUMMER and early AUTUMN terms.The children enjoy their PLAYTIMES,especially in the summer when they are allowed on the school field.Favourite games include football,"chase" and skipping.
